title: No chests and 14 keys
body: How do I get a chest? Am I missing something.  Have gotten s and s+ but haven't gotten a chest in a long time.

replies.body: There are a few requirements!  You have to get an S on a champion that you own, and you can only get one per champion per season.  More info also at our [Hextech guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)!  I hope that helps!

I wish this would change in the future. I don't like being forced to play something to get a chest for it. I like my champion pool and want to ply what best fits my play style.

agreed
you can't get a chest with the same champ you have to play with a new champ to get one every time

Just a note:  You can also get chests if you queue with multiple friends and one of THEM gets the S.

I've gotten chests in games where I played very badly but my friend got an S.

Friendship is magic.
